CSGO has been running strong for over 10 years, and at this point as tried its hardest to die with feats such as adding a battle royal and going f2p which only promoted hacking. However that being said, this game somehow not only survived going through these stages but also still thrives. With skins that rival the volitality of NFTs and a new "Short" version of comp this game is far from dead, and I cant imagine CSGO loosing its players anytime soon.
